nodes.text: Pilf Mukmuk was a Kowakian monkey-lizard member of the Ohnaka Gang. He also had a brother, Pikk. Mukmuk was responsible for stealing the lightsabers of Anakin Skywalker and Count Dooku, allowing the Ohnaka Gang to capture Dooku on Florrum during the Clone Wars. Later, when Anakin Skywalker and Obi-Wan Kenobi came to verify Dooku's capture, Skywalker spotted the lizard with his weapon and failed to get it back initially.
